body:
Comment 1: 
This is "working as expected", albeit the result may not be satisfactory. Placement of 
comments is a difficult issue, and unless the AST stores position information for 
every single token, some comments will not appear exactly where they were in the 
source.

It is not hard to maintain position information for all tokens, it is mostly a matter of 
space. More dense encodings are also possible.

Designated "long term" for now as this is not a high-priority issue.
_Owner changed to **g...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **LongTerm**._
